Package org.red5.server.tomcat.rtmpt

Class RTMPTLoader

java.lang.Object
org.red5.server.LoaderBase
org.red5.server.tomcat.TomcatLoader
org.red5.server.tomcat.rtmpt.RTMPTLoader
All Implemented Interfaces:
LoaderMXBean, ShutdownMXBean, org.springframework.beans.factory.Aware, org.springframework.beans.factory.DisposableBean, org.springframework.beans.factory.InitializingBean, org.springframework.context.ApplicationContextAware
Direct Known Subclasses:
RTMPSLoader
public class RTMPTLoader extends TomcatLoader
Loader for the RTMPT server which uses Tomcat.
Author:
The Red5 Project (red5@osflash.org), Paul Gregoire (mondain@gmail.com)
